description: A schema which validates params accepted by Improve Digital adapter
title: Improve Digital Adapter Params

___publisherId.description: An ID which identifies publisher. Required when using a placementKey

___placementKey.description: An uniq name which identifies this placement of the impression. Must be used with publisherId

___keyValues.description: Contains one or more key-value pairings for key-value targeting

___placementId.description: An ID which identifies this placement of the impression
